title: 01 In The Red
description:
7 x 30 mins

Michael Williams plays George Cragge, the frequently drunk BBC Radio Crime Correspondent, who is investigating the Bank Manager Murders, while trying to avoid an internal disciplinary hearing, and unaware of how he will become caught up in a devious plan to oust the Director General of the BBC.

A well crafted script and excellent support from such as John Bird and Stephen Fry make this well worth listening to. Three further series follow.
